Reference

All functions

add_dates()

Add dates from data

clean_nowcasts()

Clean Nowcasts for a Supplied Date

copy_report()

Copy the Nowcast Report with an Appended YAML

dist_fit()

Fit an integer adjusted exponential or gamma distribution

estimate_R0()

Estimate the time varying R0 - using EpiEstim

estimate_doubling_time()

Estimate the doubling time

estimate_little_r()

Estimate r

estimate_r_in_window()

Estimate r in a set time window

estimate_time_varying_measures_for_cases()

Estimate time-varying measures for cases

estimate_time_varying_measures_for_nowcast()

Estimate time varying measures for nowcast

estimate_time_varying_r()

Estimate time varying r

generate_sample_linelist()

Generate a sample linelist from the observed linelist and sampled linelists

get_delay_sample_fn()

Get a sampling function for reporting delays

get_local_import_case_counts()

Combine total and imported case counts

global_map()

Generate a global map for a single variable.

linelist_from_case_counts()

Sample a linelist from case counts and a reporting delay distribution

load_nowcast_result()

Load nowcast results

nowcast_pipeline()

Run a complete nowcast

plot_confidence()

Plot a Time Series with Confidence.

plot_report_delay()

Plot report delay

pull_max_var()

Pull out maximum variables values based on a variable

rbinom_size()

Draw with an offset from a negative binomial distribution

rt_pipeline()

Real-time Pipeline

sample_onsets()

Sample onset times

split_linelist_by_day()

Convert a linelist into a nested tibble of linelists by day

summarise_cast()

Summarise a nowcast
